mapper.insert: insert into tb_article(article_title, create_id, create_name, article_face, article_content,tag,modifyTime,article_state,text,create_avatar) values (#{articleTitle},#{createId},#{createName},#{articleFace},#{articleContent},#{tag},now(),#{articleState},#{text},#{createAvatar})
mapper.select: select * from tb_article where create_id=#{userId} order by article_id desc
select * from tb_article order by article_id desc
mapper.update: update tb_article set view_count=view_count+1 where article_id=#{articleId}
mapper.select: select * from tb_like where article_id=#{articleId} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update: update tb_like set like_type=#{likeType} where article_id=#{articleId} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: select *from tb_like where article_id=#{articleId} and like_type=#{likeType}
mapper.update: update tb_article set like_count=like_count+1 where article_id=#{articleId}
update tb_article set like_count=like_count-1 where article_id=#{articleId}
mapper.select: select * from tb_article where create_id=#{createId} and tag=#{tag}
select * from tb_article where tag=#{tag} order by modifyTime desc
select * from tb_article where tag=#{tag} order by comment_count desc
select *from tb_article where tag=#{tag} order by view_count desc limit 10;
select * from tb_article where tag=#{tag} order by like_count desc limit 10;
mapper.update: update tb_article set comment_count=#{commentCount} where article_id=#{articleId};
